User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the InvestPro Wallet application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user (Firebase Auth UID).

customId.description: A custom, sequential, human-readable ID starting from 100100.

googleId.description: The unique identifier for the user provided by Google.

referralCode.description: The unique referral code for the user.

investments.description: List of active investments for the user.

referrals.description: List of users who have used this user's referral code.

isAdmin.description: Flag to indicate if the user has admin privileges.

Wallet.title: Wallet
Wallet.description: Represents a user's wallet within the InvestPro Wallet application.

balance.description: The current balance of the wallet.

Transaction.title: Transaction
Transaction.description: Represents a transaction (deposit or withdrawal) in the InvestPro Wallet application.

type.description: The type of transaction (deposit or withdrawal).

accountHolderName.description: Account holder name for deposit verification or withdrawal.

accountNumber.description: Account number for deposit or withdrawal.

transactionId.description: Transaction ID provided by the payment gateway (e.g., JazzCash, Easypaisa).

method.description: The method used for withdrawal (e.g., JazzCash, Easypaisa, Bank).

bankName.description: The name of the bank if the withdrawal method is Bank.

InvestmentPlan.title: InvestmentPlan
InvestmentPlan.description: Represents an investment plan available in the InvestPro Wallet application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the investment plan.

imageUrl.description: URL of an image for the investment plan.

InvestmentCategory.title: Investment Category
InvestmentCategory.description: Represents a category for grouping investment plans.

AdminWalletDetail.title: AdminWalletDetail
AdminWalletDetail.description: Represents the admin wallet details for deposits.

id.description: Unique identifier for the admin wallet detail.

AppSettings.title: Application Settings
AppSettings.description: Global settings for the application, like transaction limits and feature toggles.

id.description: Unique identifier for the settings document.

maintenanceMode.description: Flag to enable or disable maintenance mode for the entire application.

maintenanceMessage.description: The message to display to users when maintenance mode is active.

investmentsEnabled.description: Flag to enable or disable new investments globally.

firestore.reasoning:
The Firestore data structure is designed to ensure authorization independence, clarity, and scalability for the InvestPro Wallet application. It leverages path-based ownership for user-specific data and structural segregation to maintain a homogeneous security posture within each collection. Denormalization is employed to avoid `get()` calls in security rules and ensure atomic operations.

*   **Users:** Each user has their own document in the `/users` collection. This allows for simple, path-based security rules that restrict access to a user's data only to themselves. Admins are granted read access to all user documents for management purposes.
*   **Wallets:** Each user has a single associated wallet stored in `/users/{userId}/wallet`. Path-based ownership ensures only the user can access their wallet.
*   **Transactions:** Each wallet has multiple transactions, stored in `/users/{userId}/wallet/transactions/{transactionId}`. Again, path-based ownership ensures only the user can access their transactions.
*   **Investment Plans & Categories:** Investment plans and their categories are stored in root-level collections. These are globally accessible for reading but writes are restricted to admins.
*   **App Settings:** A single document at `/app_settings/global` stores settings like transaction limits and maintenance mode status, allowing public read access for the client and write access only for admins.
